scenario.name: Basic UAS responder
scenario.send: SIP/2.0 401 Unauthorized [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[pid]SIPpTag01[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Type: application/sdp WWW-Authenticate: Digest realm="sipp.test", nonce="1234567890", opaque="0987654321", qop="auth", algorithm=MD5 Content-Length: 0

v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000
